title: Bug 138175 - Bookmark link set in drill through link is not saved in Hyperlink Options dialog
OB: When reopening the Hyperlink Options dialog, the selected bookmark is no longer displayed, even though it is saved in the XML source.
EB: The target bookmark should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog when it is reopened.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Define a drill through link.
2. Select the target bookmark in the drill through link.
